column4: hello, I'm new to IRC and new to Ubuntu/Linux, can someone help me setup a share on my dual boot machine
my share drive already has data on it and is accessible from Windows, it is FAT32, I mounted it as /mnt/share
when I try to access it ther is nothing in the folder
....hmm..... well... what do you mean by a share
great... did you format this partition?
and see if it shows up in the list
I don't even know what fstab is, I just read about it earlier somewhere
man fstab will tell you all you need to know
it might be that its set up with the wrong permissions
